messages.message:
I seem to be having cypress issues when spinning up a sandbox. Specifically, it fails on make-sandbox -> Create user and organization step
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/actions/runs/11802584660/job/32878563902?pr=64980

Looks like it can't get a license; Is anyone else running into the same issue?
```44s
Run node ./cypress/create-user-and-org.js 64980 https://crafting-cyp--pr-64980-cypress-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run z6mgsyVv9lp6o7WoqJECO2qigDHGQc cypress-drive-tests
PR number, url, oauth token, existing org name:
 {
  prNumber: '64980',
  url: 'https://crafting-cyp--pr-64980-cypress-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run',
  oauthToken: 'z6mgsyVv9lp6o7WoqJECO2qigDHGQc',
  existingOrg: 'cypress-drive-tests'
}


------------------
Setting up community user:
Success! Email: <mailto:cypress-user-64980@instabase.com|cypress-user-64980@instabase.com>
Created token for user cypress-user-64980_instabase.com (http://cypress-user-64980_instabase.com) HkI5bcreij43X1Kv4Ovfp5Lusflwec
Error: error getting license assignments: Error occurred executing GRPC method: Request /license_service.LicenseService/GetLicenseAssignments failed. Error code=UNAVAILABLE, Error=(14, 'unavailable'), Message: no healthy upstream. Retries left 0
/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:50
    throw Error(error.msg ?? error.message);
          ^

Error: error getting license assignments: Error occurred executing GRPC method: Request /license_service.LicenseService/GetLicenseAssignments failed. Error code=UNAVAILABLE, Error=(14, 'unavailable'), Message: no healthy upstream. Retries left 0
    at catchStatusCodeError (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:50:11)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
    at async createCommunityLicense (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:253:5)
    at async main (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/create-user-and-org.js:262:3)

Node.js v18.16.1```
Yea, seems like license service is down. Can you try rerunning it again?
